DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , control , multi-center study collect compare data surgeon 's current Standard Of Care stapler ( Pulmonary Artery/Pulmonary Vein transection ) power vascular stapler .
DOC.brief_title: Powered Vascular Stapler Video-Assisted Thoracoscopic ( VAT ) Lobectomies
DOC.criteria: Subjects confirm suspected diagnosis stage IA stage IIIA nonsmall cell lung cancer schedule lobectomy ( Lung Cancer Staging per American Joint Committee Cancer,7th Edition ) 5 ; Subjects schedule VATS lobectomy accordance institution 's Standard Of Care ; Performance status 01 ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group classification ) ; American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) score < /= 3 ; No prior history VAT open lung surgery ( lung procedure perform ) ; Willing give consent comply studyrelated evaluation treatment schedule ; At least 18 year age . Exclusion Criteria Prior chemotherapy radiation ( within 30 day prior procedure duration subject 's enrollment ) ; Pregnancy ; Physical psychological condition would impair study participation ; The subject judge unsuitable study participation Investigator reason .
